description: Performance baseline thresholds for CC. Values are in milliseconds unless noted.

lcp.description: Largest Contentful Paint - should be under 2.5s for good UX

cls.description: Cumulative Layout Shift - should be under 0.1 for good UX (unitless score)

tbt.description: Total Blocking Time - proxy for long-running tasks, should be under 200ms

jsSize.description: Total JavaScript size in bytes (300KB budget)

totalSize.description: Total page weight in bytes (1.5MB budget)
